panas wasakin mepitakalugala maha weherapitatha gamakata, nuwarakatakisi da nowadi daya unda  kahatath eka lesinadaya karuna paminadutu asu dana manapahan karawana daya unda  upathin siyawas sapuranabuduputh thanathura surakinasil suwanda sapirunaguna sumuguweki unda  rate yuda biya athi bawrata nopitata harunu bawlak mawa handana bawekisith, nodanna daya unda deshapalana thorathurunayaka padawi thanathuruwahini – pajaro - web adawinohandunana daya unda  thawamath hama udasanahiru basa yana sanda dinaniwanata yomu kala nethinabawun piriranudaya unda  mage meyaha diwiyehidewani upathehi piyawanabenthara kondanynyanam lada adurupanoya undaboralasgamuwe sunaga namin nelsan galhena kawiyano, wicharakayano, adurano pawidi wuha.

wathman parlimenthuwa keti kalayak thula aanshika karaka sabha kramaya , thorathuru dana ganime panatha sammatha kara ganima, swadhina komishan sabha kriyathmaka kirima, widyuth chanda kramayak handunwa dima, anthar parlimenthu rajya thanthrika sabandatha goda nanwima, parlimenthu sabha raswim sajiwiwa narambaimata janathawata awasthawa salasima, lokaye oonama thanaka sita parlimenthuwe katayuthu bhasha thrithwayenma dana ganimata jangama antharjala yedumak hadunwa dima, sthawara niyoga yawathkalina kirima, nawa aachara dharma paddhathiyak sandaha mulika piyawara ganima aadi idiri piyawara rasak thaba athi bawa da kathanayakawaraya mehidi penwa dunneya.
